Html:
Hey,

I am loading my saved graph from my custom file. When loading, the vertices are set back to their original locations from when the file was saved.

The problem I am encountering is that if the graphLayout ActualWidth & ActualHeight of the current graphLayout is smaller than the original saved graph, the vertices do no appear in the right locations.

Can anyone offer some advice on setting the ActualWidth & ActualHeight of a graphLayout?

Regards,

rootme
